resources.string: An error has occurred during the upgrade, the upgrade is aborting.
The error occurs on the board which sent the following return code information:
The board is not ready for an upgrade, please try again later.
An exception occurs during the upgrade. Please try again later or contact your application provider.
A protocol exception occurs during the upgrade. Please try again later or contact your application provider.
The transfer failed during the upgrade. Please try again later or contact your application provider.
The battery is low on your audio device. Please connect it to a charger.
The data has been uploaded on the board and the board is ready for the commit process. Do you want to commit your upload?

A previous unfinished upgrade has been processed with a different file. By continuing the current upgrade the device will loose all information from that previous upgrade.
Do you want to continue?
Error when attempted to retrieve the selected file. Please try again or select another one.
